definition: Bosworth (name)/Stephen Bosworth (1939-), US academic and diplomat, special representative for policy on North Korea from 2009
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Bosworth said the problem will take time to solve.
sentences.chinese: 博斯沃思說，這個問題需要時間解決。

sentences.english: Bosworth said he did not meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.
sentences.chinese: 博斯沃思說，他沒有和北韓領導人金正日見面。

sentences.english: “Ambassador Bosworth is fully engaged, full-time engaged, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “大使博斯沃思對此事務全力參與，”他說。

sentences.english: Stephen Bosworth wrapped up his three-day trip to the North Korean capital on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 博斯沃思星期四結束爲期叄天的平壤訪問。

sentences.english: He also met with the North's top nuclear negotiator Kim Kye Kwan
sentences.chinese: 博斯沃思還同北韓首席核談判人員金桂冠舉行會談。

sentences.english: Yesterday, the US Special Representativefor North Korea Policy Stephen Bosworth began his visit to China.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，美國對朝政策特別代表博斯沃思開始訪華。

definition: Cripps (name)/Sir Stafford Cripps (1889-1952), UK socialist politician
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
